segments.text: I notice the bright daylight coming in from the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks content drying her dishes, unaware of anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water is overflowing, creating this sad little flood on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the cabinets if it keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's right there in the puddle, but keeps on with her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my attention to the children, the boy is on that stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might fall and get hurt, which breaks my heart thinking about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, but this sneaky grabbing feels wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands waiting, her little hand outstretched so eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside makes the inside seem even more pitiful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would notice and prevent any accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a moment of innocence that could turn tragic.
segments.speaker: PAR
